articles.title: Inside Mirakl’s Agent Commerce Vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "Agent Commerce", a new vision that leverages AI-powered agents to revolutionize the way businesses interact with customers and manage their online marketplaces. This innovative approach aims to streamline commerce operations, enhance customer experiences, and drive growth through automated and personalized interactions. By harnessing the power of AI, Mirakl's Agent Commerce vision has the potential to transform the e-commerce landscape.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities to analyze vast amounts of data and provide personalized interventions. The grants will enable scientists to investigate AI-driven approaches to improve mental health outcomes and address pressing issues in the field.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI is partnering with NORAD to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to create a more interactive and immersive experience for children tracking Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. This collaboration will bring new magic to the beloved tradition, which has been a holiday staple for over 60 years. With OpenAI's AI capabilities, the program is expected to offer more personalized and engaging interactions for kids.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to help businesses accelerate their AI adoption and drive innovation. This collaboration aims to provide enterprises with tailored AI solutions, leveraging OpenAI's cutting-edge technology to improve operational efficiency and decision-making. By combining Accenture's industry expertise with OpenAI's AI capabilities, companies can unlock new opportunities for growth and transformation.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, a move aimed at accelerating the adoption of artificial intelligence in enterprise settings. This partnership is expected to enhance Thrive's AI capabilities and drive innovation in the industry. By combining forces, OpenAI and Thrive Holdings can provide more effective AI solutions for businesses, further solidifying AI's role in the enterprise sector.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, empowering developers to easily integrate and customize AI models. This update powers the AI ecosystem by providing a unified framework for building and deploying transformer-based models. By streamlining model development, Transformers v5 accelerates innovation in natural language processing and beyond.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new model that enhances its capabilities in generating high-quality images and text. This innovation is expected to improve the overall performance and efficiency of the Diffusers platform. With FLUX-2, users can look forward to more advanced and realistic outputs, further blurring the lines between human and AI-generated content.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence and machine learning models. This method, derived from first principles, aims to optimize batch processing and reduce latency, leading to improved performance and scalability. By rethinking the fundamentals of batching, this innovation has the potential to accelerate AI and ML applications.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a breakthrough in fine-tuning large language models, achieving a 20x speedup with its innovative technology. This significant acceleration enables faster and more efficient training of AI models, reducing the time and resources required for fine-tuning. As a result, developers can now deploy AI models more quickly and effectively, driving advancements in natural language processing and other applications.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, providing insights into the latest advancements in automatic speech recognition (ASR) technology. This update enables researchers to evaluate and improve ASR models for diverse languages and longer audio recordings, driving innovation in voice recognition. The expanded leaderboard is expected to accelerate breakthroughs in ASR, enhancing applications such as voice assistants and transcription services.

articles.title: Mistral 3 family of models released
articles.summary: The Mistral 3 family of models has been released, offering a new generation of AI capabilities with improved performance and efficiency. This update is expected to enhance various applications, including natural language processing and computer vision. The Mistral 3 models promise to deliver faster and more accurate results, paving the way for innovative solutions in AI-driven industries.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released Open Weights, an open-source video model that allows developers to generate high-quality videos from text prompts, marking a significant advancement in AI-powered video generation. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize content creation and pave the way for new applications in fields like entertainment, education, and advertising. By making Open Weights available to the public, Apple is democratizing access to cutting-edge video generation technology.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1925 will enter the public domain, including classic literature like F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and films like Buster Keaton's "Go West". This means that these iconic creations will no longer be under copyright, allowing for free use and adaptation. As a result, fans and creators can expect to see new interpretations and reinterpretations of these cultural touchstones.

articles.title: DeepSeek-v3.2: Pushing the frontier of open large language models [pdf]
articles.summary: Researchers have released DeepSeek-v3.2, a cutting-edge open large language model that advances the state-of-the-art in natural language processing. This model boasts improved performance and efficiency, allowing for more accurate and nuanced language understanding and generation. By making this model open-source, the researchers aim to democratize access to advanced language technologies and accelerate innovation in the field.

articles.title: How Brian Eno Created Ambient 1: Music for Airports (2019)
articles.summary: Brian Eno's groundbreaking album "Ambient 1: Music for Airports" revolutionized music in 1978 by introducing calming, atmospheric soundscapes designed to soothe travelers. Eno's innovative approach involved looping and layering gentle melodies to create a sense of continuous, unobtrusive music. This pioneering work has had a lasting impact on the ambient music genre, influencing generations of musicians and composers.
